title: Clean (Taylor's Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:20.39] The drought was the very worst
[00:25.52] Ah-ah, ah-ah
[00:29.25] When the flowers that we'd grown together died of thirst
[00:38.56] It was months and months of back and forth
[00:43.81] Ah-ah, ah-ah
[00:47.35] You're still all over me
[00:50.15] Like a wine-stained dress I can't wear anymore
[00:55.23] Hung my head as I lost the war
[00:59.38] And the sky turned black like a perfect storm
[01:04.55] The rain came pouring down when I was drowning
[01:11.39] That's when I could finally breathe
[01:14.92] And by morning, gone was any trace of you
[01:20.64] I think I am finally clean
[01:25.12] 
[01:29.38] There was nothing left to do
[01:34.35] Ah-ah, ah-ah
[01:38.43] When the butterflies turnеd to dust that covered my whole room
[01:47.53] So I punchеd a hole in the roof
[01:52.98] Ah-ah, ah-ah
[01:56.85] Let the flood carry away all my pictures of you
[02:04.25] The water filled my lungs
[02:07.47] I screamed so loud, but no one heard a thing
[02:13.92] Rain came pouring down when I was drowning
[02:20.51] That's when I could finally breathe
[02:24.11] And by morning, gone was any trace of you
[02:29.95] I think I am finally clean
[02:34.56] I think I am finally clean
[02:39.42] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah
[02:43.32] Said I think I am finally clean
[02:48.53] Ah-ah-ah
[02:50.81] Ten months sober, I must admit
[02:55.57] Just because you're clean don't mean you don't miss it
[03:00.02] Ten months older, I won't give in
[03:04.73] Now that I'm clean, I'm never gonna risk it
[03:11.13] The drought was the very worst
[03:16.28] Ah-ah, ah-ah
[03:20.05] When the flowers that we'd grown together died of thirst
[03:29.29] (Whoa)

[03:37.09] That's when I could finally breathe
[03:40.27] And by morning, gone was any trace of you
[03:46.18] I think I am finally clean
[03:48.38] The rain came pouring down when I was drowning
[03:55.30] That's when I could finally breathe
[03:58.73] And by morning, gone was any trace of you
[04:04.47] I think I am finally clean
[04:10.36] Finally clean
